Santa_Clarita.Academy of the Canyons: Academy of the Canyons (AOC) is a public middle college high school in Santa Clarita, California, United States. The school, which enrolls students from the 9th to the 12th grade, is part of the William S. Hart High School District. It is located on the Valencia College of the Canyons campus where the students of AOC are concurrently enrolled.
